Author: sidetoad
Text: I've had really similar stats at my HW as well :( really sorry to hear you're struggling. Remember that even though it feels like our whole world, weight is just one facet of a person and it's always fluctuating. Stay strong and try to be kind to yourself ðŸ’• I know in a binge phase it feels like the furthest thing from what we "deserve" but starting from a place of love is never uncalled for in my experience, especially times like this when getting put through the wringer already by ED stuff
